slogan:
The best Discord companion
for all your server needs!
features: Twitch notifications, welcome messages, utilities, and more!
twitch_alerts_description: Get notified when your favorite streamers go live.
music_description: Listen to your favorite songs in Discord.
welcome_messages_description: Welcome new members with a custom message.
choose_manage_server: Choose a server to manage from the list below
no_alerts_yet: You haven't set up any {service} alerts yet. Add one below!
add_twitch_alert_desc: Add a new Twitch alert to get notified on your server when your favorite streamers go live.
enter_twitch_channel_name: Enter the name of the Twitch channel you want to alert on
choose_discord_channel: Choose a Discord channel to send the Twitch alerts to
enter_alert_message: Enter the message you want to send when the alert is triggered. You can use
should_add_twitch_channel: You should add a Twitch channel
should_select_discord_channel: You should select a Discord channel
alert_created_desc: You can now see the alert in the Twitch alerts list.
some_error_occurred: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
alert_already_exists: An alert for this streamer already exists.
delete_service_alert_desc: Are you sure you want to delete this {service} alert? You can always add it again later.
